name: Chonk Simulator
description:
Chonk Simulator is an endless arcade farming game where you must feed a greedy creature that has taken over your home. Don’t let him get too hungry, otherwise he’ll die.

Controls:
WASD - Movement
Left Mouse Button - Interact (Harvest, pickup seeds/mushrooms, feed the chonk)
Esc - Pause

Made by Games Art Students!:
Neil Punj - Programmer
Brad Dallimer - Programmer, Game Designer
George Fisher - 2D Artist
Sarah White - 2D Artist, Asset Manager
Adam Cox - 3D Modeller
